title: 08/27/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/27/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Former NFL Lineman Ross Tucker, who explains why the Browns have one the best rosters in the NFL. Men in Blazers Co-Host Roger Bennett discusses Cristiano Ronaldo's future. And Lions QB Jared Goff talks adjusting to life with the Lions and moving on from the Rams.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
